name: InvisiScar Post-Acne Resurfacing Treatment
about: What it is:A breakthrough daily resurfacing cream that targets post-acne scars (old and new) by visibly minimizing scar size, depth, and hyperpigmentation in as little as eight weeks..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Redness, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid Exfoliant: Visibly diminishes uneven scar texture and reveals a smoother complexion..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Fight acne scars fast. This velvety-smooth formula visibly fills and blurs to quickly improve the look of scars and uneven skin. Salicylic acid exfoliates while a blend of purified
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid Exfoliant: Visibly diminishes uneven scar texture and reveals a smoother complexion..-Purified TECA Centella asiatica (Asiaticoside, Madecassic Acid, and Asiatic Acid): Hydrates to support natural skin-barrier repair..-Hydroxytyrosol and Pure Vitamin C: Antioxidants that visibly brighten and reduce dark spots...Dimethicone, Polysilicone-11, Ascorbic Acid, Silica, Dimethicone/Divinyldimethicone/Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Asiaticoside, Madecassic Acid, Asiatic Acid, Hexylresorcinol, Salicylic Acid, Acetyl Glucosamine, Hydroxytyrosol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Linalool, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use daily, AM and PM..-Cleanse with Acne Control Clarifying Cleanser (sold separately)..-Apply Clarifying Toner (sold separately)..-Smooth Outsmart Acne Clarifying Treatment (sold separately) over your entire face..-Apply InvisiScar Resurfacing Treatment to scars..-Apply Rapid Relief Acne Spot Treatment (sold separately) to breakouts. .-Complete your AM regimen with Oil and Pore Control Mattifier Broad Spectrum SPF 45 PA++++ (sold separately).
